name: Book Availablity
query:
SELECT
    tabBooks.book_name AS `Book Name`,
    tabBooks.author AS `Author`,
    MAX(CASE WHEN `tabLibrary Transaction`.status = 'Issue' THEN `tabLibrary Transaction`.date ELSE NULL END) AS `Last Issued Date`,
    MAX(CASE WHEN `tabLibrary Transaction`.status = 'Return' THEN `tabLibrary Transaction`.date ELSE NULL END) AS `Last Return Date`,
    CASE 
        WHEN tabBooks.status = 'Issue' THEN 'Issued'
        ELSE 'Available'
    END AS `Current Status`
FROM
    tabBooks
LEFT JOIN
    `tabLibrary Transaction`
ON
    tabBooks.name = `tabLibrary Transaction`.book
GROUP BY
    tabBooks.name, tabBooks.author, tabBooks.status
ORDER BY
    `Last Issued Date` DESC;
